name: Concert Kings Music Tycoon
description:
Tap and swipe to rake in the royalties in Concert Kings Idle Music Tycoon, a rock ‘n roll idle clicker!
Become a pro band manager and build a sprawling music empire in this rockin’ tapper game. Collect music notes to earn riches, then spend ‘em on epic upgrades. You’ll even earn cash while you’re away! Buy a better stage, play bigger venues, recruit new talent, jam to original rock & pop music, and impress influencers on your journey to fame and fortune.

MAKE IT RAIN
Make major money as you rise to the top of the music business in this idle tycoon game! The faster you tap and swipe, the quicker you’ll get rich. You’ll even keep earning while you’re away! Spend your millions on strategic upgrades to grow your empire. It’s a capitalist world - and you’re on top!

SIGN NEW TALENT
Recruit more than a dozen performers with their own unique abilities and style to build the best band ever. Then buy upgrades to boost their earnings and improve their look! Mix and match musicians based on their abilities or awesome appearance.

MANAGE YOUR BAND
Manage every aspect of your growing music business, from recruiting band members and hiring your crew, to booking bigger tour venues, upgrading your stage, and switching up your song. It’s Concert Kings Inc, and you’re the boss!

Download the latest game from the makers of hit music game My Singing Monsters today. You’ll be hooked in no time!
__________

NOTE: Concert Kings Idle Music Tycoon is a free-to-play game that offers optional in-app purchases. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
